{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pok√©mon & Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- !
